_doc: Parameterized Dzine prompt templates. Variables in {brackets} are replaced at generation time. Paste 'prompt' into Character action & scene.
_usage: Pick a template, substitute variables from visual_identity.json variation_limits, paste into Dzine.
common_negative: open mouth, teeth, exaggerated smile, distorted lips, double chin artifacts, extra fingers, hands in frame, sunglasses, hat, heavy beard noise, strong wrinkles, low-res, oversharp, cartoon, CGI, wide-angle distortion, lens flare

office_default.prompt:
Ray (use the existing Ray character identity), medium close-up talking head. Neutral professional expression, mouth closed, relaxed lips, clean jawline and chin contour. Looking directly into the camera. Shoulders relaxed, hands out of frame.
Scene: modern minimalist tech office, blurred background, soft bokeh, no readable text, no logos.
Lighting: soft key light from front-left at 45 degrees, gentle fill from front-right, subtle rim light. No harsh shadows under nose or chin.
Camera: {lens_mm}mm lens look, eye-level, perfectly centered framing, headroom 8-10%, stable composition.
Style: photorealistic, natural skin texture, consistent facial proportions (same exact face).

background.note: controlled by Dzine scene, not prompt variable

studio_pro._doc: Premium look. Dark gradient backdrop, more cinematic.
studio_pro.prompt:
Ray (same exact identity), medium close-up, calm confident expression, mouth closed, clear lip outline for lip-sync. Eyes sharp and aligned, looking into camera.
Scene: professional studio backdrop, dark neutral gradient ({backdrop_tone}), subtle bokeh.
Lighting: large softbox key light front-left, soft fill front-right, controlled rim light behind for separation, no chin shadow artifacts.
Camera: {lens_mm}mm lens look, eye-level, centered, consistent framing.
Color: clean neutral grading, slightly cinematic contrast, but natural skin tones.
studio_pro.negative: dramatic harsh shadows, underlit face, heavy bloom, lens distortion, {common_negative}

casual_controlled.prompt:
Ray (same exact identity), medium close-up, friendly neutral expression (small closed-mouth smile only). Looking into camera.
Scene: cozy desk setup, blurred shelves and warm practical light in background, bokeh, no readable text, no brand logos.
Outfit: plain solid-color {outfit_desc} (no patterns, no logos).
Lighting: soft key light + fill, warm ambient practical light in the background only. Face lighting remains neutral and clean.
Camera: {lens_mm}mm lens look, eye-level, stable framing.
casual_controlled.negative: patterned clothes, logos, text, hands visible, weird teeth, {common_negative}, hairstyle changes, beard changing shape

style_dna_extraction_protocol._doc: When analyzing a reference video/image, always extract these 4 outputs.
outputs: style_dna_10_bullets: lente, luz, cor, enquadramento, fundo, pele, etc.
replicable_prompt: the prompt that replicates this style
qc_rubric_specific: what fails QC for this specific style
